page.title: 01The Calbourne District
page.content: The block includes most of the rural village of{Calbourne}and can be divided roughly into thirds: (1) One third{arable farmland}with residential patches, (2) One third{forest,} (3) One third{downland}and{permanent {pasture.} There are approximately{fifty {households} in the area, about three quarters of these being actually within the village boundary. Most houses are privately owned and occupied. There are only two{dairy farms} in the block, the rest being mainly {arable}with some{beef cattle}and {sheep.}
